decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span lang="EN-US" style="">The proposed single storey rear
extension, by reason of its siting, scale and projected depth, would be unduly intrusive
and overbearing, leading to a sense of enclosure, and loss of outlook and
daylight/sunlight to the rear habitable windows of the adjacent property no. 14
Canons Drive, </span>contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework
(December 2023), Policy D3 D.1, D.7, D.11 of the London Plan (2021), policy CS1
B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM 1 of the Development Management
Policies Local Plan (2013), and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document:
Residential Design Guide (2010).<span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">The proposed single storey rear
extension; alterations to roof; rear dormer; by reason of its siting, projected
depth and built form would result in an inappropriate form of development
contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy
Framework (2023), Policy D3 (D(1) and (11)) of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the
Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development
Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning
Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).<font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></font></p>
description: Single storey rear extension; alterations to roof; rear dormer
